message.body: Salam Fernaz! What's your home address? We'd like to send Sorays a small gift for her graduation!
It is a pleasure!! We like her
I am sorry that swath didnt work out and happy that BMC is renewing your contract
I have no idea what's going on at swath now! Khaled isn't the best communicator in the world.

I am partly disappointed that I couldn't get the Swarthmore job but then as I said I know better. He could be making it up. I mean when he says that he really wanted me there. Why he would do that I don't know.

I have no idea. He is a hypo! I honestly can't believe anything he says. I left swath and he ever wrote a word to say thanks or just anything:) so if I were you and I was relaxed and comfy in my job at BMC, I would just stay put. Swath is only one year and the pay isn't as good as what you have now

I am very comfy in BMC and I was worried about losing my slot there since the Swarthmore job was not going to be stable. I was also worried about working with Khalid and his friend...so in many ways it is better that I stay at BMC.
Yes, you can apply next year from a solid position! I assume it will be for three years then.
Lets see. So far so good.
Great! I am happy to hear it is resolved
